hackathon-rules:
1. All projects must be created after the beginning of the jam.
2. External libraries are allowed as long as they're freely available to everyone.
3. All games must be somewhat tied to the theme of the jam.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Google Cardboard and more cool stuff!

hackathon-description-header: Penn Play Game Jam 2015 - Game Development Hackathon hosted at the University of Pennsylvania
